channel.title: Adding a shop
channel.description: Ive added the NPC in autospawn and everything and I see him but when I add a shop in shops.cfg and compile, on the server when you trade the NPC it crashes.

item.title: Adding a shop
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

I cant even trade him now these are the codes:

  else if (NPCID == 520) { // Armour shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 42;
}

That was my wanneshop

shop = 42	@whi@Good Armour Shop				2	2	3140	10000	7964	10000	4087	10000	6570	10000	4153	10000	7970	10000

That was my shops.cfg edit

spawn = 520	3252	3428	0	0	0	0	0	1	Shop Keeper near home

And that was my Autospawn. Please tell me what Im missing or just give me a tut on how to add a shop. Thanks!

Read full topic
